price: 59 C’est ainsi qu’Allah appose un sceau sur le cœur de ceux qui ne veulent pas connaître la vérité.
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ يَطۡبَعُ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: kadhālika yaṭbaʿu al-lahu ʿalā qulūbi alladhīna lā yaʿlamūna
